text: Gérard Sulon (3 April 1938 – 18 October 2020) was a Belgian footballer who played as a midfielder. Sulon played for RFC Liège, CS Schaerbeek, Beerschot VAV and Crossing Schaerbeek. He also played for the Belgian national team between 1964 and 1965. Sulon died on 18 October 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian footballers
title: Gérard Sulon
